decision.title: Rust CLI as primary interface
decision.rationale: Single compiled binary easier to distribute than multiple scripts. Clap provides excellent UX. Rust compilation ensures reliability.

decision.title: Skills bundled via include_str!()
decision.rationale: Skills travel with binary. No network dependency for distribution. Source in skills/ directory allows version control and editing. Future: Binary extracts to ~/.config/opencode/skill/ on `aiandi init`.

decision.title: Phased migration from "spandaworks"
decision.rationale: Changing all references at once would break existing installations. Binary names and import paths preserved until coordinated release. MIGRATION_NOTES.md documents what stays and what changes.

decision.title: Templates for AGENTS.md
decision.rationale: Users need guidance for project-specific agent instructions. Minimal template for quick start, comprehensive for full coverage. Reduces friction in adopting aiandi for new projects.
